title: Spread of French Rev. ideals in Europe

content.prompt: In subsequent years, the French government used the institutions created by the decree to

choices.label: attempt to spread French Revolutionary ideals throughout Europe
start nationalist uprisings in countries outside of France
encourage internal debate concerning the proper course of the revolution in France
justify the granting of greater political and legal rights to women

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
